name: DANGER: Destruction Site
description:
Have you ever dreamed of steamrolling your annoying boss? Well, in this game you can dream exactly that! Just the dream part though.

Move through the buildings in construction destroying everything in your path and get as high a score as possible!

This game was made as an entry for JamGoJam DNA 6.

JAM STUFF

Criteria #1: Endless Runner

The game is an endless runner with a simple level generation algorithm that makes for a fun and addicting experience.

Criteria #2: Fantasy

While located in a fantastic location, the game juxtaposes this against a common real-life scenario to bring out the weirdness and impossibility of the events in the game. Also, said events happen as a dream of the player, using the theme of Fantasy to justify the constant resetting of the game.

Criteria #3: Devil May Care

The player jumps across buildings and construction platforms in a very reckless manner with complete disregard for the people sitting around the buildings.

Criteria #4: Epic Music

The game features a dynamic music engine that makes use of horizontal composition to emphasize the destroying of buildings with choir chords.

ASSETS

All assets, including music and sound effects were made by me during the 5-day time period.

Art by me using DawnBringer's 16 Color Palette.

Font used in score is Courier New.
